summary: THROTTLE CABLE STUCK WIDE OPEN, HAD TO USE "PARK" TO STOP THE VEHICLE.  FOUND RECALL ONLY ON 2000 FORD FOCUS MODELS WITH SPECIFIC VIN NUMBERS.  CALLED FORD, SAID DID NOT APPLY, HOWEVER IT HAPPENED TO ME.  DEALER DOES NOT HAVE PARTS ON HAND, NO GUARANTEE OF SAFETY IN THE FUTURE.  FORD MOTOR COMPANY DOES NOT TRUELY LISTEN TO COMPLAINTS.    *AK
